SEARCH
Package DataAccess

Class AbstractDAO<T>

java.lang.Object
DataAccess.AbstractDAO<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of entity managed by this DAO
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClientDAO, OrderDAO, ProductDAO
public class AbstractDAO<T> extends Object
An abstract Data Access Object class providing common functionality for accessing and manipulating entities in the database
